Other Information.Additional Info: Polysulfides could not penetrate or bond in the nanopores of the 2D CuBDC sheets even after 60 days of immersion.

Experimental Validation.Method: Polysulfide diffusion experiment, operando Raman spectroscopy
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Capacity retention: 78% over 500 cycles at 0.5 C, specific capacity: 795 mA h g⁻¹ at high sulfur loading of 5.2 mg cm⁻²

Other Information.Additional Info: The 2D CuBDC sheets exhibited excellent suppression of polysulfide shuttling and facilitated long cycling stability in Li-S batteries.
